JobFullDesc: Inside Sales Product SpecialistAt Dell Technologies, we create the extraordinary. Our Inside Product Specialists are the experts who sell innovation to the world. Responsible for a set of products and services, they get to know their portfolio inside and out. Our Inside Sales teams rely on them for technical consultancy during the sales process. They directly advise customers on everything from product features and configurations through to pricing and availability. Crucially, however complex the question, they’re ready to deliver technical solutions to meet customers’ needs via phone, chat, web or email.Join us as a Product Specialist in our Small BusinessEnterprise Infrastructure Specialist team in Round Rock, TX to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.What you’ll achieveAs an Inside Sales Product Specialist, you will deliver solutions that address customers’ varying needs, either working on your own or with a subject matter authority on more sophisticated solutions.You will:- Provide experienced mentorship and direction to the Core Sales team on solutions- Understand and maximize complex multidimensional solutions and explain how they will benefit the customer’s business- Achieve or exceed targets by selling solutions and developing positive relationships with our partners, distributors and executive leadership- Utilize strategic probing to identify, evaluate and recommend highly sophisticated alternative technology solutionsTake the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:Essential Requirements- Knowledge of products and services, industry trends, and competition in order to position Dell’s products effectively with customers- Strong analytical, decision-making and organizational skills- Ability to balance demands from multiple partners, coordinating teams where appropriate to ensure timely delivery- Strong communication skills and the ability to establish and maintain relationshipsDesirable Requirements- 4+ years of related experience in a relationship selling role- Bachelor’s degree in related fieldHere’s our story; now tell us yoursDell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era.
